mapper.insert: insert into tbl_timeline(tno,mno,content) values (seq_tno.nextval, #{mno, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select tbl_user.nickname, tbl_user.picture, tbl_timeline.content, tbl_timeline.likecnt, tbl_timeline.replycnt, tbl_timeline.regdate from tbl_timeline join tbl_user on tbl_user.mno = tbl_timeline.mno order by regdate desc
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_timeline where tno = #{tno, jdbcType=INTEGER}
